Dialog 1.Scene: The apartment. Sheldon is stood in the middle of the room. His whiteboard is behind him. Every few moments he turns round suddently.

Dialog Turns 0.Speaker: Penny
Dialog Turns 0.Dialog: Whatcha doing?

Dialog Turns 1.Speaker: Sheldon
Dialog Turns 1.Dialog: I'm attempting to view my work as a fleeting peripheral image so as to engage the superior colliculus of my brain.

Dialog Turns 2.Speaker: Penny
Dialog Turns 2.Dialog: Interesting. I usually just have coffee. You've been up all night?

Dialog Turns 3.Speaker: Sheldon
Dialog Turns 3.Dialog: Is it morning?

Dialog Turns 4.Speaker: Penny
Dialog Turns 4.Dialog: Yes.

Dialog Turns 5.Speaker: Sheldon
Dialog Turns 5.Dialog: Then I've been up all night.
